verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I saw the Lord
seated on His throne
He was clothed in glory,
exalted high

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And the train of His robe,
filled the temple
The angels circled round Him
and they cried

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are holy, oh so holy,
You are holy Lord of all
